text: Gabber may refer to: == Music == * The gabber, or early hardcore, a subgenre of hardcore music that originates from Netherlands around 1993 and declined around 1998. * The gabber, or mainstream hardcore, a subgenre of hardcore music that appeared around 2003. == Computing == * Gabber (instant messaging client), a free software and open-source GNOME client for instant messaging XMPP network. ==People with the surname== * Ofer Gabber, a French mathematician. ==See also== * Gab (disambiguation) * Gabba (disambiguation) * Jabber (disambiguation)
title: Gabber (disambiguation)
